channel.title: Need server host!
channel.description:
Hello,
I was wondering if first of all 2 people can host a server. And if you can I need a partner to help me host.
You need to know basic java coding. Have java jdk 6. And must have run a server previously in ur life.
Thanks.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 06, 2007, 08:11:50 PM[/size][hr]Any1?

item.title: Need server host!
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

yeh, see I need to know if it is possible to host from different ppl so i dont have to keep my computer on all the time.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 06, 2007, 08:23:06 PM[/size][hr]any1 willing to help?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 06, 2007, 08:29:51 PM[/size][hr]no1?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 06, 2007, 08:40:57 PM[/size][hr]damit[br][size=1]Posted on: January 06, 2007, 08:47:59 PM[/size][hr]PLEASE I JUST NEED ATLEAST 24 HOUR HOSTER!!![br][size=1]Posted on: January 06, 2007, 08:53:00 PM[/size][hr]PLEASE!!!

Read full topic
